::: Inferno, Black Aracnia, and Rampage join Double Punch by the Ark, ready 
to attack. :::

::: Inferno ::: The royalty has sent us to help you. We must destroy the 
enemy colony for the Queen!

::: Black Aracnia ::: Shut up hot head, we know what were doing. You tunnle 
us in, and we do the damage. Rampage?

::: In his beast mode, he sits in the back, almost sulking over something, 
his attention elsewhere. :::

::: Rampage ::: I can smell them. They know we are here, I can sense the 
adreniline rushing to there juicy heads...

::: Black Aracnia ::: ...I bet you do. Now, lets do this!

~~~~~~~~

::: Waspinator was now deep within the forest with Shredder, going to get the 
scrap they needed. :::

::: Waspinator, in the front leading because he felt he was better than 
Shredder, ::: Waspinator thinks we should go that way! Waspinator commands 
that we go that way!

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron takes a small break from construction and sees the two Predacon 
blips on his scanners that are Shredder and Waspinator. He sighs, and turns 
to Darkmouse. :::

::: Megatron ::: Darkmouse, report. How our are systems functioning?

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Marine looks to the screen with Hell Beast's face on it. He had finally 
gotten a message to him. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: General Marine, change the towers radition beakon to the 
Maximal frequency. Were going to attack them and with out communications they 
will not be able to get reinforcements.

::: Marine looked to Pheniox who typed in a few codes. The insignia on the 
computer screen changed from the Newcomers Predacon face, the the Maximals 
animal face. :::

::: Marine ::: It is done Commander.

::: Hell Beast ::: Good. Wait there, im sure there will be someone attacking, 
although we could use you at the Maximal base....no matter. Remain there. 

::: Marine nodded, and the computer switched off. :::

~~~~~~~~~`

::: Set, followed by Ra and Ominous come to the ship to see Defector standing 
outside of it, talking to someone. :::

::: Set ::: Who the hell is this now?

::: Ra's hands glow with flames ::: I will burn them alive!

::: Set ::: No you idiot, they are talking to Shuko. Lets go inside.

::: The three enter the ship, and go into the bridge to see Shuko. :::

::: Ominous ::: Who is that outside the ship?
